articles.content: Akshay Kumar, Pankaj Tripathi and Yami Gautam starrer OMG 2 earned a whopping 12.06 crore on Day 4 in India. The day 4 earnings were bigger than opening Friday which about 10 crore. The total collect… [+1968 chars]

articles.title: Amitabh Bachchan says he cried freely while watching son Abhishek Bachchan’s Ghoomer: ‘Saw it back to back, twice’ - The Indian Express
articles.description: After an absence of more than a year, Abhishek Bachchan is now set to make a comeback with the eagerly awaited sports drama film Ghoomer, directed by R Balki, in which he will be starring alongside Saiyami Kher.
